mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (faq_num,question,content,faq_writer, user_regdate) VALUES(faq_seq.NEXTVAL, #{question}, #{content}, #{faqWriter}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT faq_num, question, content, user_regdate, update_date, update_id, faq_writer, delete_yn_code FROM FAQ WHERE delete_yn_code='N' ORDER BY faq_num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd}
SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM FAQ WHERE delete_yn_code='N'
